## Description

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires unit tests for PayPalProcessor across multiple files (PayPalProcessor, PaymentAdapterFactory, PayPalProcessorTests), involving dependency injection, factory pattern, and test isolation. Touches 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory and associated test files, exceeding 400 LOC and involving multiple domains.
